rules.description: hold A and backslash to produce backslash
control a, e to column 0, n
hold A & F and backslash to produce pipe
k to n, m, c, v fix
mod_sc to c and v fix
mode j to c and v fix
[⌂⇧] Ru holdJ+§,1–4,6–7 to En: 🇷🇺holdJ≈🇺🇸L⇧; r⌂⇧+1–4,6–7 ⟶ ⌃⌥1–4,6–7 (@'Russian — TypES' mapped to en⇧) r⌂⇧§ ⟶ ⇧`
single tap left shift to esc
caps to lControl; shift + caps to caps
